text: unfair insurance trade practices rebating amend rsa ix b to read as follows the rebate of all or part of a producer s commission on the sale of commercial insurance as defined in rsa provided the insurer expressly provides for such rebate in rate filings approved by the commissioner and the reduction of the commission is not disclosed to the insured either directly or indirectly the payment or assignment of all or part of a producer s commission on the sale of insurance to an employee of the producer
